thread.title: Paul Niesen
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Paul Niesen

author: Paul Niesen
title: Paul Niesen
text: Talk about top-of-the-line customer service! I had to call for a pause early into my project to correct some errors not found during my reviews. The Discmakers crew quickly paused everything for me and seamlessly picked things up where they'd left off once I submitted the corrections. I couldn't ask for better and quicker service. This was my 5th project with this company -- it certainly won't be my last one! Thank you, Discmakers, for yet another job well done!
